alert.note: Alert for Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 9:37PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri and Illinois... Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Saverton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently near crest at 20.2 feet and will remain near that level for the next 2-3 days. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Saverton 16.0 20.2 20.2 20.2 20.2 19.9 19.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
